Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored 68 runs off 46 balls.
Luke Wood took 3 wickets for 24 runs.
Adil Rashid took 2 wickets for 27 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: England captain Moeen Ali won the toss and opted to bowl.
Left-arm fast bowler Luke Wood made his T20I debut for England.
Batter Shan Masood played his first T20I for Pakistan.
Pakistan’s players wore a special kit to show solidarity with flood victims.
England’s players wore black armbands as a tribute to Queen Elizabeth II.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are on their first tour of Pakistan in 17 years to play seven Twenty20 internationals.
The remaining matches of the series are scheduled in Karachi and Lahore.
